New Records: Florian Wirtz scored the fastest-ever goal in a national team game (7 seconds)
Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored the opening goal, Kai Havertz scored the second goal
Pre-Game Insights: Toni Kroos was coaxed out of international retirement for the upcoming European Championship
Post-Match Reflections: Julian Nagelsmann received a timely boost from the victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was Germany's second consecutive victory over France
Others: Antonio Rüdiger produced a late goalline clearance, Marcus Thuram fired the first France chance over, Marc-André ter Stegen denied Kylian Mbappé a one-on-one opportunity
